Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) could have great application potential and technological development.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, there are no studies that have quantitatively and rigorously estimated the environmental impacts in the future scenario.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study fills this gap through an innovative approach consisting of patent-based technological forecasting and prospective life cycle assessment (LCA).
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The analysis of the 58 selected patents reveals that future SOFCs could have (on average) +53% specific power which could lead to a 56% mass reduction compared to current SOFC.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The prospective LCA shows an average global warming potential (GWP) reduction of 50%.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The future tubular layout is more sustainable than planar one by about 15%.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: GWP decreases with increasing specific power and in cells with smaller sizes and thicknesses.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, the ductile future SOFCs, dedicated to mobile applications and dynamic loads, have a GWP greater than future stationary SOFCs, but still equal to half of the current SOFCs.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All these results therefore confirm the potential of the patented SOFC developments on environmental sustainability, arguing in favour of their industrial development and a more massive application in the future.
Titulo: Prospective life cycle assessment to support eco-design of solid oxide fuel cells
